title: Cloud Engineering Manager
description:
This role is an opportunity for a technologist with a passion for Linux and Cloud technologies to build a career with Canonical and drive the success with those leveraging Ubuntu and open source products. If you have an affinity for open source development and a passion for technology, then you will enjoy working with some of the best people in the industry at Canonical.
   

  

**Engineering Manager**
 The BootStack team designs, builds, and operates modern distributed systems on private infrastructure for customers. From Kubernetes to OpenStack and everything in-between, you'll be working with the latest technology in a fast-paced engineering environment. As a Cloud Engineering Manager for the BootStack team, you will be responsible for managing the engineers that oversee day-to-day Managed Service of customer environments, including customer service management, managed services operations and consistent product improvement engineering. Collaboration with customers, product engineering, and operations is critical to success.
   

  

**As an Engineering Manager you will:**
* Manage a growing engineering team to optimise the quality and velocity of both development and operations
* Identify and measure team health indicators
* Implement disciplined engineering and operations processes
* Represent the BootStack team with respect to stakeholders, customers, and external teams
* Ensure proper team focus on priorities, milestones, and deliverables
* Work to meet service level agreements with customer deployments around the globe
* Deliver quality managed services in a consistent, timely manner


**The successful Engineering Manager candidate will have:**
* Bachelors (or equivalent) education in a technology field
* Proven track record of professional experience of either software delivery using Python, Go, C, C++, Java, or similar and/or managing operations teams
* Proven experience with OpenStack
* Demonstrated strong commitment to testing methodologies and maintainable code quality
* Experience with Linux system administration, Ubuntu/Debian a plus
* Strong communication and cooperation skills
* Experience with agile software development methodologies
* Experience working in and managing distributed teams
* Technical aptitude for understanding complex distributed systems
* Experience with cloud topologies and technologies
* Travel to team and company events and customer meetings, roughly 20% or less


**What we offer you**
 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person - we've been working remotely since 2004!
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues from your team and others
* Priority Pass for travel and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm that is at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do.
   

  

 Canonical has been a remote-first company since its inception in 2004. Work at Canonical is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game. Canonical provides a unique window into the world of 21st-century digital business.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Content Creator Internship
description:
Vill du vara med och bygga varumärkeskännedom för företaget Bolago genom kreativt innehåll och sociala medier?
 




  







 ﻿
 
 Vi söker en engagerad och kreativ Content Creator som vill vara med och vidareutveckla vårt arbete online. Som praktikant med ansvar för våra sociala medier kommer du att hjälpa oss att genomföra vår kommunikationsstrategi på sociala medier och andra digitala plattformar. Du kommer att ha ansvar för Bolagos synlighet i sociala medier och vara med och formge våra budskap samt dela information om hur man driver företag på ett enkelt och intuitivt sätt. För att trivas i din roll hos oss behöver du vara intresserad av bolagsbygge och entreprenörskap.
 




  





**Om Bolago:** 





 På Bolago sköter du all administration av ditt företag utan huvudvärk. Hantera din aktiebok, professionalisera styrelsearbetet och genomför investeringar och optionsprogram – allt på en säker plattform. Bolago är betrodd av startups och växande företag för sin användarvänliga plattform och omfattande funktioner, vilket gör att du kan fokusera på det som är viktigast: ditt företag.
 




  





**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:** 





 Som Content Creator kommer du att arbeta nära vårt kommersiella team med fokus på följande arbetsuppgifter:
 



* Sätta vision och tonalitet för kreativt innehåll
* Ta fram content-idéer med stöd från teammedlemmar
* Skapa innehåll i form av bild, text och rörligt material för våra digitala plattformar
* Publicera och hantera våra sociala kanaler samt schemalägga inlägg
* Formge och designa material (Photoshop, Canva, InDesign)
* Omvärldsbevakning och analys av sociala plattformar hos liknande SaaS-tech företag



  





**Vem vi söker:** 



* Du är driven, självgående och har förmågan att kommunicera effektivt
* Du är flexibel, noggrann, strukturerad och initiativtagande
* Du studerar inom eller har erfarenhet av att arbeta med grafisk illustration, kommunikation eller marknadsföring
* Du kan skapa och ta fram innehåll, bild och enklare rörligt material av rätt kvalitet för olika kanaler och målgrupper
* Meriterande om du har viss erfarenhet av META Business Manager, Ads Manager, Campaign Manager, Photoshop, Indesign, Canva
* Du har erfarenhet av foto, film, bildredigering eller animering för sociala medier
* Du har god kunskap om SoMe-innehåll på kanaler som LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram och TikTok



  





**Praktikinformation:** 



* Praktikplatsen är deltid. Vi är öppna för att praktikens längd
* Praktiken är obetald
* Arbetsplats: Södermalm, Stockholm
* Arbetsformat: Remote



  






 Om du är intresserad av denna möjlighet, skicka ditt CV och personliga brev till sofie@bolago.se med ämnesraden "Content Creator internship" senast den 15 februari 2025. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande och praktiken kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag.

title: Marketing & Communications Coordinator
description:
**About Us**
 We are the independent expert in assurance and risk management. Driven by our purpose, to safeguard life, property, and the environment, we empower our customers and their stakeholders with facts and reliable insights so that critical decisions can be made with confidence.
   

  

 As a trusted voice for many of the world’s most successful organizations, we use our knowledge to advance safety and performance, set industry benchmarks, and inspire and invent solutions to tackle global transformations.
   

  

**About Business Assurance**
 We help companies ensure compliance, build high-performing management systems, and meet competence needs within a wide range of industries. DNV helps companies understand Working with us, you can be involved in technically challenging and innovative projects worldwide demanding a broad variety of expertise. Our strong focus on research and innovation opens an array of opportunities, and allows you to engage in projects which develop next generation solutions. and manage their risk picture through our management system certification and training portfolios.
   

  

**About The Role**
**Are you ready to transform communication into a powerful tool for business success?**
 As our
 **Marketing & Communications Coordinator** 
 , you will be at the forefront of crafting and executing communication strategies that not only support lead generation but also elevate our brand in Sweden. If you have a talent for translating strategic objectives into compelling narratives, this is your chance to make a significant impact!
   

  

 In this dynamic role, you'll manage lead generation and nurturing across social media, email campaigns, and website, in a multi-channel approach that ensure alignment with our brand's voice. you'll lead the creation and distribution of impactful marketing assets, including white paper, newsletters, presentations, and digital content.
   

  

 Additionally, you'll play a key role in internal engagement, event coordination, and PR efforts, driving visibility for DNV Business Assurance across the industries in focus.
   

  

 This is your chance to collaborate with key stakeholders in an international environment and elevate our messaging to new heights, shaping how we connect with the customer and reinforcing our commitment to excellence.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
* Develop and Implement: Design and roll out communication strategies and initiatives across digital and physical channels to boost performance and lead generation in a multi-channel approach.
* Collaborate for Impact: Partner with Sales, Business Development, Operations, and other internal stakeholders to launch targeted campaigns that deeply resonate with specific market segments, in alignment with the global strategy.
* Lead Initiatives: Execute go-to-market communication plans, including engaging events, impactful webinars, co-branding activities, content marketing, and vibrant digital/social campaigns.
* Drive Continuous Improvement: Monitor and analyze key metrics to optimize strategies, ensuring sustained growth and effectiveness.
* Budget Management: Oversee the local communication budget, ensuring the successful execution of plans aligned with corporate guidelines.


 What we offer
   

  

* A stable environment within a world-leading company in business assurance.
* The opportunity to make a real impact, working with a dynamic, hands-on team.
* Hybrid working options from our Swedish office.
* Competitive compensation package with flexible work arrangements.
* Excellent learning opportunities and access to cutting-edge tools and platforms.


 DNV is an Equal Opportunity Employer and gives consideration for employment to qualified applicants without regard to gender, religion, race, national or ethnic origin, cultural background, social group, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, age or political opinion. Diversity is fundamental to our culture and we invite you to be part of this diversity.
   

  

**About You**
**What You Bring:**
* Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in marketing communications discipline
* Experience: A minimum of 3 years in a similar role
* Digital Expertise: Strong understanding of digital, web and social media marketing techniques, including email marketing, digital campaigns, content marketing and web-based campaigns.
* Technical Skills: Familiarity with marketing tools such as Optimizely CMS, Oracle Sales Cloud CRM, Eloqua, GoToWebinar, Canva and other content platforms preferred.
* Channel Experience: Hands-on experience with go-to-market channels, including events, digital, social, and email marketing.
* Industry Knowledge: Familiarity with the certification market is a plus.


**Your Soft Skills**
* Adaptable & Proactive: Thrive in dynamic environments by taking the initiative and adjusting to changing circumstances.
* Collaborative Spirit: A natural team player with a knack for building strong, productive relationships.
* Customer-Centric Focus: Always prioritise the customer experience in every effort you undertake.
* Organisational Skills: Highly organised and adept at managing multiple projects effectively under pressure.
* Results-Driven: Passionate about delivering impactful communication that drives measurable outcomes. Adaptable and able to take initiative in dynamic environments.

title: Data Engineer to Corporate Functions at SEB in Solna
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fuelled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.*
**About The Role**
 Are you ready to play a crucial role as a Data Engineer in supporting Technology (Corporate Functions) to help realize SEB's and Tech's visions from a Finance, Risk, and Compliance perspective? You will achieve this by enhancing our data acquisition and management capabilities. SEB is committed to being data-driven and customer-centric, utilizing data effectively and ethically to foster new business opportunities, automation, and compliance with regulations. The primary objective is to ensure that accurate, consistent, complete, and up-to-date data is available to key stakeholders at SEB, enabling teams to drive innovation and adapt to the business landscape.
   

  

 You will be joining the relatively new team FR360. This team plays a crucial role in transforming the FRC domain by ensuring that SEB financial and risk data and processes are scalable, automated, resilient, and operate on a modern cloud platform (GCP) with real-time capabilities.
   

  

 The team works with several use cases which gradually will grow. The main focus at the moment is sustainability reporting.
   

  

**Responsibilities In The Role**
* Design, develop and maintain a data platform built on GCP aligned with business requirements
* Design, develop, validate, publish, and maintain physical data models required to implement business processes and solutions
* Review and optimize existing data flows
* Support with communication to technical and business stakeholders of data to ensure adequate solutions
* Collaborate with data architects and business analysts to analyze requirements, develop, and implement according to specifications


**Who We Are Looking For**
* Proficiency in industry standard techniques for data modeling for core and mart layers of data warehouses, business intelligence models, and data products
* Proficiency in scripting or programming, preferably in Python, Java
* Ability to analyze data (using SQL) to validate model hypotheses
* Good understanding of traditional data warehouses and preferably cloud data architecture patterns
* Curious mindset and willingness to continuous learning
* Self-propelled and driven
* Fluent spoken and written English
* We believe you are collaborative, have a positive can-do mindset.
* You are motivated to understand complex business initiatives, models and systems and enjoy ever-changing challenges.
* You have a passion for learning in general.


**What We Offer**
 We offer an opportunity to join an organization where data is at the core, a friendly team to grow within, and extensive opportunities to build your network within the bank for further personal and professional growth.
   

  

**Ready to join?**
 Attach your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to SEB. Since we select candidates on running basis, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2025-01-05. If you have questions about the position, please contact Andreas Gustavsson, Team manager, by mail andreas.gustavsson@seb.se .

title: Service Delivery Manager
description:
*Vi söker nu dig som vill ta en central roll i Advanias arbete inom Managed Services Provider (MSP) för att skapa framgång för våra kunder. Som Service Delivery Manager får du möjligheten att ta ansvar för att leveranserna aktivt stödjer kundens verksamhetsmål och skapar långsiktigt värde*
 Service Delivery Manager på Advania 🚀
   

  

 Som Service Delivery Manager blir du en central del av våra kundteam, där du ansvarar för den operativa leveransen till våra kunder. Du är kundens primära kontaktpunkt och fungerar som en strategisk partner som hjälper dem att navigera IT-landskapet för att nå sina verksamhetsmål. Denna tjänst har placering i Örebro eller Solna.
   

  

 Rollen kombinerar operativt ansvar med strategiskt samarbete och inkluderar bland annat att:
   

  

  

* Balansera det dagliga ansvaret för operativa leveranser med att identifiera och driva långsiktiga förbättringar som stärker kundens verksamhet.
* Säkerställa att leveranserna stödjer kundens verksamhetsmål och affärsstrategi.
* Proaktivt identifiera förbättringar och utvecklingsmöjligheter som skapar verkligt värde för kunden.
* Bygga långsiktiga och hållbara relationer med kunder och interna team.
* Ta fram och analysera rapporter för att identifiera trender och förbättringsområden.
* Fungera som eskaleringsväg och säkerställa att problem hanteras snabbt och effektivt.


 Du arbetar i ett engagerat team av Service Delivery Managers och samarbetar nära våra lokala leveransteam och dedikerade kundteam.
   

  

**Vad rollen erbjuder dig** 
 🌟
   

  

 Här på Advania blir du en del av en dynamisk och utvecklande miljö där du får möjlighet att:
   

  

  

* Ansvara för att våra leveranser aktivt stödjer kundens verksamhetsmål och bidrar till långsiktigt värde.
* Driva förbättringar och hantera komplexa utmaningar som skapar utveckling för både kunden och företaget.
* Arbeta med både operativa och strategiska frågor i nära samarbete med kunder och leveransteam.
* Bygga starka och långsiktiga relationer som skapar framgång och förtroende hos både kunder och kollegor.
* Samarbeta med kompetenta kollegor i en miljö som präglas av engagemang, samarbete och gemensamt driv.


 Vad vi söker hos dig ✨
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av att leda komplexa IT-leveranser och skapa värde för kunder genom att vara både operativt drivande och strategiskt tänkande. Du trivs med att bygga starka kundrelationer och samarbeta med team över olika funktioner och geografier.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du har:
   

  

  

* Erfarenhet från roller som Service Delivery Manager, IT-chef eller liknande.
* Dokumenterad framgång i att hantera operativ leverans och kundrelationer.
* Förmåga att analysera och förbättra leveransprocesser baserat på data och trender.
* Certifiering inom ITIL eller motsvarande utbildning inom ITSM (meriterande).
* Förmåga att anpassa budskapet till mottagaren och kommunicera på en nivå som passar både tekniska experter och affärsinriktade beslutsfattare.
* Goda kommunikationsfärdigheter på svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.


**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!** 
 👋
   

  

 Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete.
   

  

 Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll och det kan förekomma personlighet- och logiktest, en för oss kvalitativ kontroll inför ett anställningsbeslut.
   

  

 Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor eller funderingar.
   

  

 Advania Sverige, ”The tech company with people at heart”, har kontor över hela landet, från Luleå i norr till Malmö i syd. Dagligen hjälper våra 1 700 specialister våra kunder, både inom privat och offentlig sektor, i deras ambitioner och mål att digitalisera sina verksamheter. Genom långsiktiga relationer, ledande teknologier, moderna plattformslösningar och strategiska partnerskap formar vi framtidens IT-landskap. Vårt syfte sträcker sig bortom teknik: att ge människor kraften att skapa hållbara värden.
   

  

 Advaniagruppen levererar tjänster till kunder i Sverige, Norge, Storbritannien, Island, Finland och Danmark inom hållbar och säker digitalisering.

title: Senior Solutions Architect
description:
**Description**
 Automat-it is an all-in AWS Premier partner that empowers startups with DevOps and FinOps expertise and hands-on services. We guide and support hundreds of startups leveraging AWS smarter throughout their growth journey. We save our customers significant time to market and optimize their cloud performance and cost-effectiveness.
   

  

 Automat-it operates in more than seven countries across EMEA. We provide a dynamic environment where you can expand your professional expertise and make a significant impact.
   

  

 In this position as Senior Solutions Architect, you will be a crucial member of the pre-sales process, working with account managers to develop AWS solutions for our startup customers.
   

  

 📍 Work location - Remote within Sweden.
   

  

 ✈️ Travel Requirements: 20% (mainly Stockholm).
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and implement solutions to meet business requirements and create cost-efficient, highly available, and scalable solutions for customers, including Well-Architected reviews and SoW.
* Research and analyze current solutions and initiate improvement plans.
* Collaborate with other engineers and stakeholders to ensure solutions are designed and developed according to best practices.
* Share your knowledge with our customers and the cloud community by participating in public speaking engagements such as workshops, conferences, webinars, and more.
* Frequent travels - locally (on-demand to meet with customers and partners and attend local events) and abroad (at least once a quarter).


**Requirements**
* 3+ years of hands-on experience in an AWS environment, including implementation, migration, and maintenance, designing solutions end-to-end
* 2+ years of experience in technical customer-facing roles, such as Customer Engineering, SRE, Cloud Architect, or equivalent
* 2+ years of experience in an IT environment, including hands-on in Kubernetes, CI/CD, and DevOps tools - advantage
* Proven experience in a production environment, developing software with either Python, Go, Java, or equivalents
* In-depth knowledge of AWS's main services, with an emphasis on Kubernetes and Containers
* Successfully designed DevOps and Infrastructure for high-scale production environments in AWS
* Understanding of Information Security best practices
* Certified AWS Solutions Architect - Associate.
* AWS Solutions Architect Professional or a specialty certification - an advantage
* Ability to effectively communicate technical design in verbal and written formats in front of customers
* Ability to lead an end-to-end engagement with the account management team
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both English and Swedish
* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment


 Automat-it is committed to fostering a workplace that promotes equal opportunities for all and believes that a diverse workforce is crucial to our success. Our recruitment decisions are based on your experience and skills, recognizing the value you bring to our team.

title: Power BI Architect
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and IT System Custom Software Development
description:
Job Description :
 



  





 Skills:
 **Power BI, Power Automate, Power Apps, SAP HANA, SQL, Data verse, Expertise in Power BI Desktop, Power BI Service, Power Query, DAX, and Power BI Report Server, Knowledge of data warehousing concepts and architecture. Familiarity with Agile methodologies, especially in BI development.** 




  





 Architecting Power BI Solutions:
 



 Lead the design and architecture of Power BI-based reporting and analytics solutions, ensuring they meet organizational goals for performance, scalability, and usability.
 



  





 Data Modeling:
 



 Develop robust and efficient data models within Power BI, ensuring that the data is structured for optimal performance and easy consumption by end-users.
 



  





 ETL Processes:
 



 Oversee and implement ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to ensure seamless data integration from various sources into Power BI.
 



 Dashboard and Report Development: Lead and mentor the team in creating visually appealing, interactive, and insightful dashboards and reports tailored to various business units.

title: Vi söker en erfaren och driven ledare till vårt DMA-team!
description:
**Vi söker en erfaren och driven ledare till vårt DMA-team!** 




  





 Är du redo att leda ett nystartat team som utvecklar och designar framtidens dataplattform?
 



 Data Platform-teamet på Fora arbetar för att möjliggöra datadriven utveckling, beslutsfattande och analys med en robust, skalbar och säker dataplattform byggd på Azure i en data-lakehouse arkitektur som tillsammans med PowerBI skapar analytiska förmågor. Vårt team designar, implementerar och förvaltar dataplattformen som främjar autonomi och flexibilitet i hela organisationen. Vi samarbetar nära med andra tvärfunktionella team, i vårt team finns roller som Data Engineer och Data analytiker för att förstå behov, iterera lösningar och leverera värdedrivna resultat. Vi implementerar bäst praxis för datastyrning, åtkomstkontroll och efterlevnad och utnyttjar och vill använda de senaste verktygen och branschstandarderna.
 



  





 Vi söker nu en Engineering Manager för det teamet, Data Management & Analytics (DMA), som kommer att övervaka utvecklingen och implementeringen av molnbaserade dataplattformsteknologier och även levererar rapporter, dashboards och analyser till verksamheten och våra parter.
 



  





 I teamet ansvarar du även för In- och Utdata, där du tillsammans med verksamhetsutvecklare ansvarar för helheten inom det området, samt har rollen som Data Governance Lead för att leda datastyrning i hela verksamheten.
 



  





**Vi tror på dig som vill göra skillnad** 




 På Fora är du en del av något större, och bidrar till ett tryggare arbetsliv för de miljoner människor på den svenska arbetsmarknaden som omfattas av kollektivavtalad tjänstepension och försäkringar. Kliv in i vår värld och möt engagemang, kunniga kollegor och genuin gemenskap. Är du redo för ett viktigt uppdrag?
 



  





**Din roll** 



* Leda design, utveckling och underhåll av dataplattformar och dataanalysverktyg
* Arbeta nära IT-arkitektur och hela verksamheten för att bygga en färdplan för dataplattformen
* Säkerställa plattformens tillförlitlighet, skalbarhet och prestanda
* Hantera relationer med leverantörer och integrationer av tredjepartslösningar
* Utvärdera nya teknologier och trender för att driva innovation och konkurrensfördelar
* Som Data Governance Lead - leda och driva utvecklingen av en organisation till en effektiv datastyrning
* Implementera datastyrningspolicyer för att säkerställa datakvalitet, säkerhet och efterlevnad
* Samarbeta med team inom integration, Digitala tjänster och Cloud team när det behövs
* Leda och coacha ett team av Data Engineers, Data Analytiker och verksamhetsutvecklare
* Främja en samarbetsinriktad och högpresterande arbetsmiljö.
* Hantera projekt, resurser och budget för att säkerställa att allt levereras i tid, inom budget och med högsta kvalitetsstandard



  





**Kvalifikationer** 




  





**Det här har du med dig** 



* Minst Kandidatexamen i datavetenskap, data science, teknik eller ett relaterat område
* 5+ års dokumenterad erfarenhet av att hantera molnbaserade data- och AI-plattformar i en komplex miljö
* 5+ års dokumenterad erfarenhet att leverera analytiska insikter och arbete med verktyg såsom PowerBI i en komplex miljö
* Mycket goda ledarskaps-, kommunikations- och samarbetsförmågor
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att leda tvärfunktionella team och projekt
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att införa och leda datastyrning
* Goda kunskaper inom molnplattformar och verktyg för databehandling (t.ex. Azure Synapse Analytics, Databricks, Snowflake etc.)
* Förståelse för AI- och maskininlärningsramverk
* Stark problemlösningsförmåga och ett strategiskt tänkesätt
* Förmåga att hantera flera prioriteringar och anpassa sig till förändrade krav
* Goda kunskaper i engelska och svenska



  





**Ansökan:** 




 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Fora med HCM Partner AB. Vid frågor, kontakta Parisa Zafaranian på parisa@hcmpartner.se
 



  





 Urvalsprocessen och intervjuerna påbörjas omgående. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
 



  





**Vi erbjuder dig** 




*Prestigelöst samarbete* 




 Vi är övertygade om att vi är bättre tillsammans. Fora är en öppen arbetsplats som kombinerar expertkunskap med stort hjärta, där vi tar vara på varandras olikheter och där alla får vara sitt bästa jag.
 



  





 “Mina kollegor är kunniga och lätta att prata med, vänliga och måna om att hjälpa till.
 



 Det är ett öppet klimat.” - Olga, gruppchef IT.
 



  





*Flexibilitet och förtroende* 




 Vi jobbar för en bra balans mellan arbete och fritid, och vår kultur präglas av flexibilitet, förtroende och ansvar. Här finns både utvecklingsmöjligheter och stöttande ledarskap.
 



 “Det är häftigt att jobba någonstans där man får göra världen lite bättre för dem där ute.” - Simon, handläggare.
 



  





*Bidra och påverka* 




 På Fora får du bidra till ett tryggare arbetsliv för miljontals svenskar. Välkommen att driva, påverka och skapa ett hållbart samhälle som står starkt för framtiden.
 



 “Det är både roligt och utvecklande att få vara med och förvalta och utveckla en av de
 



 största tjänstepensionsplanerna i Sverige.” - Thomas, affärsansvarig.
 



  





**Start:** 
 2025-01-01
 



**Plats** 
 : Stockholm
 



**Omfattning** 
 :
 
 Heltid
 




**Kontakt** 
 :
 
 parisa@hcmpartner.se
 




  





 Vi använder oss av tester som ett komplement i rekryteringsprocessen. Vi tillämpar
 



 6 månaders provanställning och gör bakgrundkontroller innan anställning.
 



 Vi ser fram emot att få din ansökan!
 



  





**Fackliga representanter är:** 




 Susanne Christensen, Forena, telefon: 08-787 45 78 och Anna Hammarberg, SACO, telefon: 08-787 45 97.

title: IT Architect (Distribution Business)
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

 Vattenfall is recognized as one of the first movers in the energy transition – and by that power climate smarter living for all our customers.
   

  

 Yet, our investment power, innovation, and ambitious change agenda to become fossil free in one generation, can only be met if the Swedish grid is ready to deal with this electrification revolution. To face this challenge we invest in our people and we continue to employ exceptional IT talent. With our team, we are advancing the Distribution business area in Vattenfall as a data driven company allowing them to optimize decision making and investment planning.
   

  

 This means we are architecting:
   

  

* Full IT/OT convergence to ensure frictionless transfer of data (near) real time
* Advanced solutions to deliver real-time insights into the performance of our grid, substations, transmission lines to lower maintenance costs
* IT infrastructure and solutions that are hyper-scalable and reliable to meet Distribution reliability and growth target
* Seamless and secure market communication and open data sharing to support Europe’s vision for an interconnected grid.
* Strategic solutions/landscapes to meet Distribution’s Strategic Targets (Distribute twice the amount of electricity, and distribute with 99.99% continuity)


 Our team requires true Business facing Solution architects; You know how to use technology to make Distribution run as
 *clockwork* 
 , you act as
 *timer* 
 to ensure we meet our ambitious goals and be an
 *alarm* 
 if we can do better! We have a large SAP and Microsoft footprint, with more than 20.000 users in six countries
   

  

 Our Group IT Architecture team of 30 enterprise / solution architects is involved in around 100+ key projects at any time, focusing on enterprise architecture and solution architecture for all Vattenfall business units. We act as the hub to understand business needs and to see the bigger Vattenfall picture to help our teams securely adopt the technologies of tomorrow.
   

  

 Your main responsibilities:
   

  

* You will join the larger strategic projects, to guide them into successful execution based on fit-for-purpose architecture
* You will consult and educate the Distribution business on IT strategy, integration strategy, data strategy etc
* You have a solid understanding of IT security and will support Distribution in fit-for-purpose adoption.
* You will have (or build up) Distribution domain knowledge to become the go-to point how Distribution should advance its IT landscape.
* You will, in dialogue with business, drive a further adoption of data mesh
* You will help us grow our Enterprise thinking and establish standards and architecture principles. You will be our trusted advisor towards our Distribution and other business area’s to enable their operating model by technology – also if that is that means radical change!


 Din bakgrund
   

  

 We are looking for a seasoned Architect, with experience preferably as architect or consultant in water or energy utilities, manufacturing, or automotive.
   

  

 You feel comfortable communicating with both IT and non-IT colleagues on different levels in the organization. You enjoy being in an ever-changing environment. Furthermore you:
   

  

* Have an academic degree in IT or related study
* Have worked in an international environment and you speak Swedish and English
* Have deep IT knowledge and experience with IT architecture and frameworks
* Ideally bring experience from an asset intensive industry – and you understand security considerations, IEC 62443, ISO27001 etc.
* Have experience with Microsoft Azure Well Architected Framework
* You enjoy producing enterprise ready architecture documents
* And you have the skills to direct complex problems into concise Management Board action
* And… we love architects who talk business and know TOGAF, rather than those that talk TOGAF and know business …


**Location:** 
 for this position you will be based in Sweden, with some travelling to the office (Stockholm, Solna). Occasionally also travel to Distribution locations, like Trollhattan or Amsterdam and Berlin for team events. Travel will be approximately once month for two days.
   

  

 Mer information
   

  

**Our Offer**
* Become part of a massive transformative purpose – not on paper, but in real-life – whereby you can influence the outcome!
* We offer a challenging and international work environment and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field.
* You will work in an interdisciplinary team with other senior IT Architects – so we do this together!
* A professional environment where your experience, knowledge and attitude will bring us one step further and the opportunity for you to grow further.
* A central office location with easy access by public transport.
* Furthermore, a healthy work-life balance (smart working) and time to develop your profession
* At Vattenfall you get the opportunity to work for a clean energy company that aims for creating fossil free energy within one generation.
* And last but not least; International and multi-cultural work environment with energetic, motivated colleagues that like to have fun as well!


**More information**
 We welcome your application in English, including CV and cover letter via our website. For information about the position, please contact recruiting manager Emile Das, +31 6 5250 4359. For more information about the recruitment process, you are welcome to contact Recruiter Folmer Koper +31 6 38710915.
   

  

 At Vattenfall, we are convinced that striving for diversity helps building a more profitable, efficient and attractive company. We continue to seek a harmonious balance of employees in terms of gender, age, ethnic and cultural backgrounds.
   

  

 Since Vattenfall is a part of the Swedish critical infrastructure, many of our services are security classed. If this position is security classed the final candidates might be subjected to a security vetting process, according to the Swedish legislation.
   

  

 Om oss
   

  

 Vattenfall is one of Europe’s largest producers and retailers of electricity and heat. Our main markets are Sweden, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, and the UK. The Vattenfall Group has approximately 20,000 employees. We have been electrifying industries, powering homes and transforming life through innovation for more than 100 years. We now want to make fossil free living possible within one generation and we are driving the transition to a sustainable energy system.

title: Copy of Senior FP&A Solution Consulting Nordics (CPM / BPM / EPM)
description:
We are in Business for People, empowering people in service organizations with innovative Enterprise and Business software solutions. We’ve innovated and taken a new approach to delivering a Business Platform with ERP, FP&A, HCM and Procurement that works for people. Self-driving, adaptive and intuitive software that is changing the way people work. Our solutions empower people and deliver a better people experience so people can spend time on meaningful high value work they live for.
   

  





 Read more on our website about how we transform work and how people feel about it, so our customers and their people can thrive.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 Our job in Solution Consulting is to understand our customers’ business challenges and to accurately show how Unit4 solutions can solve these challenges. To attain the best possible solution, you will spend time researching and discovering the customer’s challenges and goals.
   

  




* You will understand the customer, and challenge them, and become their voice in the sales process.
* You will delight and inspire our customers to help build and deliver their desired end goals.
* You are a trusted advisor who will naturally lead our customers and colleagues; you adapt, plan and mobilise people.
* You will be an expert in Unit4 solutions, you will understand and sell the value of Unit4solutions and why Unit4 is different to other suppliers in the marketplace.
* You love technology and you are driven to find the best possible solutions for our customers.
* Your expertise is what sets you apart from other roles in sales, customers will trust your advice and Unit4 professional services will believe in the vision you create for customers during the bid stages.
* The role will join and support the Nordics region and, as part of a global team, support all regions of the business on all FP&A solution consulting requirements from RFPs through to custom demo builds, through to demo delivery and presentations.


**Qualifications**
* FP&A / CPM / BPM / EPM presales / solution consulting / consulting experience.
* A professional financial qualification and/or relevant experience in the office of finance is desirable.
* Fluent Business level local languages and good English
* Technical FP&A / CPM / BPM / EPM experience and capabilities to model based on business requirements.
* You have a proven ability to create and deliver engaging solutions supported by excellent presentation and written skills.
* Demonstrable analytical skills and problem solving ability.
* You are an excellent communicator, have a good sense of humour and enjoy working in a team environment.
* You have the ability to build rapport within the organization and with external stakeholders at all levels.
* Previous experience or understanding of the wider Unit4 offerings is desirable, but not essential.


**Additional Information**

 Join Unit4 and you’ll be part of one of the most exciting journeys in the cloud software space today. We’re a fast-paced and high-growth people-centric cloud player offering a host of benefits & development opportunities for individuals serious about their career
   

  




* Work, learn & be inspired by some of the best talent in the software space
* Whole host of great benefits & perks, including uncapped time off!
* Talent program for high performers. Each year we provide a platform for high potential talent to accelerate their careers!
* Committed to corporate social responsibility with our Act4Good initiative, our global movement to do good, and a way for everyone at Unit4 to come together and engage in actions that benefit society
* Diversity4U. Helping our people thrive starts with a safe and inclusive work environment. We launched our Diversity4U program that builds on our “be genuine” value



 Enterprise software: ERP, FP&A, S2C, HCM - Unit4
   

  





 Unit4 is an enterprise software suite, including finance management, accounting, ERP, FP&A, S2C, HCM and talent management modules.

title: Azure Specialist (AVD/Citrix)
description:

**W H A T W E N E E D 🙏🏻**
 At Xenit, we have two Specialist Teams who are typically in need of Azure competence - one within MS Infrastructure Services, governance and architecture,
 **(** 
**Team XCET)** 
 and our
 **Workspace Team** 
 . Our Workspace Team is currently interested in an Azure Specialist with a focus on technologies such as:
 **Citrix, AVD, Netscaler** 
 and/or
 **S** 
**ecurity** 
 .
   

  

 The Workspace team is responsible for managing the Xenit Azure Virtual Desktop feature service, which you will have the opportunity to continuously develop and improve. Like most people with sense, we hate carrying out the same task time and time again, so you will make sure to streamline and automate anything that can be automated.
   

  

**Examples Of Potential Tasks**
* Managing customers' AVD environments (including incident management, change management and developing environments).
* Participating in projects with a focus on implementation and set up of Virtual Workspace solutions
* Acting as a general Azure resource in other consulting assignments


**C O U L D Y O U B E A M A T C H ?**
**We Believe Our Next Azure Specialist Has**
* 3+ years of experience with Microsoft Azure; preferably within Azure Virtual Desktop
* Experience with cloud migration, transitions and transformation projects.
* Experience with Citrix or other virtual environments
* Skills within Infrastructure, Windows Server and Networking
* Understanding of Security


**It Is a Bonus If You Have**
* Skills within Automation
* Work within Entra ID, AD, Identity
* Relevant certifications


**We Also Believe That You Are a Person Who**
**-** 
 Acts on their own initiative, makes things happen and takes
 **responsibility** 
 for their work
   

  

* Has their head in the clouds ☁️ and is a believer in the "cloud-first" approach
* Has a methodical and structured way of working
* Can understand/analyze complex issues quickly
* Collaborates effectively with others and builds good relationships with both customers and colleagues
* Enjoys sharing knowledge and experiences in order to support colleagues in reaching common goals
* Fluent in spoken and written Swedish and English
* Above all else, displays kindness and compassion in everything they do


**W H Y C H O O S E X E N I T ?**
**B E N E F I T S 🎁**
 Xenit boasts a large benefits package, including but not limited to: Wellness allowance, health insurance, föräldralön bonus, ergonomic workplaces and more.

***"Xenit is an outstanding employer where corporate culture and well-being are at the center. Here, the employees are part of a warm and inclusive community where their well-being and well-being are prioritized. By offering an environment where collaboration, creativity and innovation are encouraged, employees can thrive and develop while contributing to the company's success."***
 Read more about Karriar Företagen here.
   

  

* Microsoft Partner of the Year Sweden 2024 🎉🥂

title: Revenue Cloud Solution Engineer - Nordics/Benelux
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
*To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.*
 Job Category
   

  

 Sales
   

  

 Job Details
   

  

**About Salesforce**
 We’re Salesforce, the Customer Company, inspiring the future of business with AI+ Data +CRM. Leading with our core values, we help companies across every industry blaze new trails and connect with customers in a whole new way. And, we empower you to be a Trailblazer, too — driving your performance and career growth, charting new paths, and improving the state of the world. If you believe in business as the greatest platform for change and in companies doing well and doing good – you’ve come to the right place.
   

  

**Revenue Cloud Solution Engineer**
* This role can be filled in any of the Nordic countries, or Benelux, depending where we find our nr 1 candidate-


 At
 **Salesforce Revenue Cloud** 
 , we’re redefining how businesses manage revenue by simplifying complex processes across the entire revenue lifecycle. Our mission is to help companies accelerate growth with our next-generation
 **Quote-to-Cash** 
 and
 **Revenue Lifecycle** 
 solutions, all seamlessly built on the world’s #1 CRM platform.
   

  

 Salesforce Revenue Cloud empowers businesses with a comprehensive suite of capabilities, including
 **CPQ, Billing, Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM), Order Management, Subscription Management,** 
 and
 **Asset Lifecycle Management** 
 . These tools enable customers to optimize and automate every stage of the revenue process— from configuring quotes and managing contracts to orchestrating orders, handling recurring subscriptions, and tracking the lifecycle of assets.
   

  

 With Salesforce Revenue Cloud, organizations can capture ROI faster, deliver seamless customer experiences, and unlock growth opportunities like never before. Our customers benefit from innovations such as
 **Agentforce** 
 , AI-driven insights, and deep integration across the Salesforce Customer 360 platform.
   

  

 As a
 **Revenue Cloud Solution Engineer** 
 , you’ll be instrumental in driving customer success by showcasing the power of these solutions. You’ll partner with sales teams to design, demonstrate, and deliver compelling value propositions tailored to each customer’s unique challenges.
   

  

**Your Impact**
 You Will Be a Trusted Advisor To Our Customers, Helping Them Address Their Unique Challenges And Achieve Their Goals With The Salesforce Revenue Cloud Suite. Specifically, You Will
   

  

* Discover: Collaborate with business and technical stakeholders to understand their pain points and identify opportunities to unlock value through CPQ, Billing, CLM, Order Management, Subscription Management, and Agentforce.
* Design: Craft innovative solutions that showcase how Revenue Cloud automates and simplifies revenue processes, including quoting, contracting, billing, order management, and customer support scenarios.
* Deliver: Lead compelling product demonstrations, workshops, and whiteboarding sessions that connect business needs to Salesforce solutions, highlighting innovations like CLM and AI-driven capabilities in Agentforce.
* Enable: Educate internal teams and external audiences on emerging trends, product developments, and industry best practices, ensuring successful adoption and implementation.
* Digest: Stay up-to-date on the latest product roadmaps, industry news, and trends to provide insightful recommendations to our customers.


**Minimum Qualifications**
* A degree in Accounting, Finance, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent experience
* Knowledge of related applications, relational databases, web technologies, and APIs
* Understanding of accounting, billing, tax, revenue recognition, and subscription-based models
* Excellent written, verbal, presentation, and interpersonal communication skills
* Ability to work collaboratively in complex, cross-functional environments
* Pre-sales consulting experience, including RFP support, discovery sessions, solution design, and demonstrations
* Strong storytelling and public speaking abilities


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Expertise with Quote-to-Cash and Revenue Cloud solutions
* Professional certifications (e.g., Salesforce CPQ, Billing, or Financial Management certifications)
* Experience as a solution/sales engineer for CPQ, Billing, Contract Lifecycle Management, Subscription Management, Order Management, or Financial Management systems
* Hands-on experience with Salesforce CPQ, Billing, Sales Cloud, or any Salesforce Industry Cloud
* Knowledge of subscription billing, revenue recognition, and SaaS pricing models
* Public speaking experience (events, webinars, or conferences)


**Bonus Skills**
* Web development skills and familiarity with APIs (REST/SOAP)
* Experience with Salesforce Commerce Cloud or integration scenarios between Revenue Cloud and Commerce Cloud
* Membership in professional organisations such as CPA/ACCA or equivalent
* Data/AI experience


 Accommodations
   

  

 If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.
   

  

 Posting Statement
   

  

 At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at www.equality.com and explore our company benefits at www.salesforcebenefits.com.
   

  

 Salesforce is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Salesforce does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Salesforce will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesforce.
   

  

 ﻿Salesforce welcomes all.

title: Business consultant – Social Care - Tietoevry Care (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
**At Tietoevry Care you’ll get a chance to provide citizens and end users with product offerings that help them in their life, reinventing the world for good. If that sounds interesting, please keep on reading.**
****About Tietoevry****
 Tietoevry Care is modernizing the Nordic health and Social care sector with modular, open, and interoperable software. We develop and deliver high quality software solutions and services that enable healthcare and welfare professionals to do their work even better and with higher efficiency - have more time to care.
   

  

 We are a global team of professionals working on providing products and services to different sectors within health and welfare. In addition to working closely with our customers, we also have our own products that we build and develop for various fields in society. With us you can build technology for the good of society and make your mark on the health and wellbeing of people in need.
   

  

****About The Role****
 Do you want to work with a market leader, modern product portfolio for the next generation of offering to our welfare industry? Do you have deep domain knowledge about the municipality’s welfare and social care? Do you have experience of working as a social worker, system administrator in a municipality or have been working in Lifecare or a similar system?
   

  

 As part of our growth strategy, we are seeking a Business consultant that help us to continue to implement Lifecare for the Swedish municipal social care market. Our team consists of professionals within Project Management and Consulting that working towards and together with our customers to implement Lifecare, that gives the municipality simplified work processes, high support in the daily work and increases the possibilities of putting the caretaker at the center through well-developed citizen services.
   

  

 In Tietoevry we believe in openness, independent thinking, and providing our employees with opportunities to grow.
   

  

**In this role you will**
 In this role you will be responsible for implementing Lifecare for our customers. You will have a close dialogue with them, to plan the implementation and how to get the best value from the system by suggesting how to streamline their work and set up their processes.
   

  

 This involves both travel within Sweden for on-site training, as well as being able to hold trainings and meetings digitally and remotely. As a dedicated Consultant you will have great opportunities to contribute to the development of our system Lifecare for the entire municipal Individual- and Family Services sector. You will
   

  

* Arrange and lead meetings with customers
* Plan and implement trainings for our customers in Lifecare Individ- och Familjeomsorg
* Create content and provide webinars
* Bring in ideas based of the customer needs to support further development of Lifecare
* Advise customer on working methods and how to get the optimal value of using our solutions
* Create training materials
* Keep up to date with laws and regulations in the field


**We are looking for someone that**
* Has a Degree of Bachelor of Science in Social Work
* Has a genuine interest and experience in individual- and family care services within municipal social care
* Broad experience and deep domain knowledge primarily of the Swedish welfare and social care landscape, experience using Lifecare IFO or other equal systems for individual and family services
* Good knowledge of current legislation around the social care act
* Has strong pedagogical skills
* Can express yourself clearly in Swedish, both spoken and written


 As a person you are an engaged and open team player who loves providing excellent service to our customers and drive things forward. You are attentive and always eager to learn more and enjoy sharing and increasing your knowledge while working with others collaboratively. You are motivated by planning your working days yourself and the mix of both working together with colleagues and customers as well as independently.
   

  

**What’s in it for you?**
 With us you will be part of the important and meaningful work in the area of social care. You have an important mission to make a difference that really matters. In addition, as a company we offer you professional growth, open and friendly culture, and an outstanding work-life balance! We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working.
   

  

 Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle. We want to encourage you to keep up that curiosity and deepen your knowledge on topics you’re interested in. For example, we host a ‘Keep Learning Week’ once a year, a week where everyone at Tietoevry has the possibility to join different training courses in a truly global setting.
   

  

**Could you be our new colleague?**
 We look forward to hearing from you! We will fill the position as soon as we find the right person, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact the hiring manager anna.kristiansson@tietoevry.com
   

  

*We perform background checks on all final candidates.*
*Tietoevry declines calls from recruitment companies.*
****About Tietoevry****
 Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.
   

  

 Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs.
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Sales Director CVX Ventures Sweden
description:
**Jobbeskrivning -** 
**Sales Director CVX Ventures Sweden**
 Trivs du i en snabb och dynamisk miljö där du får stort ansvar? Vill du vara en del av ett exceptionellt entreprenörsteam med unga, motiverade och drivna individer? Är du nyfiken på eller har en passion för venture capital? I så fall kan du vara vår nya Sales Director i Sverige.
   

  

**Ditt Mission**
 Som Sales Director blir du den första personen på plats för att bygga upp och leda vår svenska försäljningsverksamhet i Stockholm. Detta är en hands-on roll där du ansvarar för att bygga upp och underhålla en stark försäljningspipeline, säkerställa korrekt prognostisering och slutföra affärer i tid. Du har förmågan att arbeta med försäljning både strategiskt och operativt, och du behärskar en konsultativ försäljningsprocess.
   

  

**Vårt Mission**
 CVX är en av Europas snabbast växande riskkapitalaktörer, på väg att bli Europas största riskinvesterare genom att erbjuda snabbväxande bolag kapital, kunskap och nätverk.
   

  

 Vi drivs av tron att de bästa investerarna är de som kan ge grundare rätt kunskap, erfarenhet och nätverk för specifika skeden och branscher. CVX investerar alltid tillsammans med de bästa affärsänglarna för varje enskild grundare.
   

  

 Idag har CVX över 600 partners som investerar och bidrar till bolag där de kan göra verklig skillnad. CVX består nu av 20 ambitiösa individer i Köpenhamn, London, Oslo – och snart även i Stockholm.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter**
* Utveckla och implementera din försäljningsstrategi
* Driva försäljning och kontinuerligt nå och överträffa intäktsmål
* Rekrytera, utveckla och leda ett förstklassigt säljteam när dina försäljningsmål är uppnådda
* Delta i budgetarbete och sätta mål för organisationen
* Följa upp KPI:er och utveckla handlingsplaner för att förbättra resultaten
* Driva investeringsprocessen från prospektering till investering
* Representera CVX vid evenemang, konferenser och sammankomster
* Samarbeta nära med andra i organisationen
* Rapportera direkt till CEO.


**Vad vi förväntar oss av dig**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet gärna inom riskkapital, snabbväxande startups eller dynamiska miljöer
* Naturlig förmåga att sälja och framgångar med att nå och överträffa intäktsmål
* Hög arbetsmoral och "sense of urgency"
* Exceptionell drivkraft och vilja vara bäst på det du gör
* Proaktivitet och förmåga att ta ägandeskap för allt du gör
* Stark förmåga att skapa samarbete och tillit mellan människor, samt vinna förtroende hos affärsledare
* Starkt intresse för riskkapital och startups
* Starka kommunikationsförmågor på lednings- och styrelsenivå
* Utmärkta analytiska och problemlösande färdigheter
* Ödmjukhet och med en passion för att bygga och utveckla nya verksamheter
* Flytande svenska och engelska
* Stort plus om du har ett nätverk inom det svenska startup-ekosystemet.


**Vad vi erbjuder dig**
 Som Sales Director hos oss får du en resa fylld med personlig utveckling, karriärmöjligheter och tillväxt. Du blir en del av en organisation med stark laganda och ambitiösa kollegor.
   

  

* En dynamisk arbetsmiljö med ambitiösa och talangfulla kollegor
* En kultur präglad av kontinuerligt lärande och utveckling
* Möjlighet att ha direkt inverkan på CVX och portföljbolagens framgång
* Coaching och utvecklingsmöjligheter
* Kombination av fast lön och resultatbaserade incitament.


**Startdatum:** 
 Så snart som möjligt.

title: Senior Sales Manager, Cash Management (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 We are looking for a
 **Senior Sales Manager** 
 who wants to be part of Tietoevry Banking. Tietoevry Banking is the leading financial services software and solution partner in the Nordics. We offer modular, pre-integrated banking as a service solutions and market-leading software for core, payments, credit, cards, financial fraud, and wealth. With our scale, expertise, and specialization, we empower financial institutions to enhance agility, efficiency, and accelerate digital transformation.
   

  

 Tietoevry Cash Management is a Market leading Cash Management software and SaaS provider. We develop and deliver State of the Art Cash Management solutions like Virtual Account Management, Cash Concentration, Notional Pooling and other liquidity capabilities. Our All-in-One Cash Management Platform is used by large Banks across different geographies. We’ve been recognized by multiple Analysts and the recent one being best-in-class Virtual Account Management provider in Europe by Datos.
   

  

 We are looking for an experienced Sales Manager who drive our Go to Market Strategy and contribute significantly to the success of our business goals and growth strategy.
   

  

**With us you will be responsible for:**
 Implementing Sales strategy and effectively managing the sales cycle, including lead generation, prospecting, qualifying, business development, and closing to be able to meet our targets and growth Strategy.
   

  

**When joining Tietoevry Banking as a Senior Sales Manager:**
* Build relationships with potential new customers, identify and develop leads
* Creating pipeline and closing deals
* Lead contract negotiation with bid teams
* Executing go-to-market plan together with sales and marketing teams
* Maintain relationship with potential customers and own sales case until handover to Delivery
* Develop and close contracts and project statements of work with customers
* Support compliance and other audit activities with customers
* Contribute to thought leadership in Cash Management & Liquidity space


**Who we are looking for:**
* 10+ years of Experience selling Enterprise Software and SaaS solutions to Banks & Financial Institutions
* Demonstrated successful track-record of winning new strategic long-term deals
* Experience and understanding of the cash management or transaction banking business domain
* B2B software sales experience is a plus
* Strong commercial acumen and negotiating skills
* Experience with writing and negotiating contracts
* High-level sales or executive presentation skills with ability to gain credibility and trust with a variety of technical and non-technical stakeholders and influencers within the customer organizations
* Excellent Communication and presentation skills.
* Strong Network of potential prospects and partners


**As a person you are:**
 You are an engaged and open-minded team player with excellent communication skills. You are proactive and service-minded in your work, distinctly self-motivated and have the confidence to take on full responsibility. This allows you to hit the ground running and reach your highest potential with us. Also, your ability to influence and collaborate makes you a natural change agent and thought leader. You lead by example and enjoy challenging and inspiring people. This allows you to take advantage of the freedom and opportunities you’ll be offered.
   

  

**We offer**
 We offer you professional growth, meaningful projects, open culture and an outstanding work-life balance! We offer you an opportunity to create the future of a growing, fast-developing and important sector. We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.
   

  

**Did we get you inspired?** 
  

  

 We look forward to your application!
   

  

 Interviews will be held continuously, so we encourage you to apply today! For more information or questions, please contact Talent Acquisition team recruitmentinbanking@tietoevry.com
   

  

 Hope to hear from you soon!
   

  

 Location: Oslo, London, Solna/ Stockholm, Riga.
   

  

*On specific positions we might perform background checks.*
**About Tietoevry**
 Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.

Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs.  Creating purposeful technology to reinvent the world for good

We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Software Test Engineer till Väderstad kontor i Linköping
description:
Väderstad AB är en ledande aktör inom jordbruksindustrin, och vi är på en resa mot en mer avancerad och automatiserad framtid. Med en ständigt ökande befolkning och mindre och mindre jordbruksmark blir vikten av högteknologiska, robusta och kvalitativa maskiner som gör det enkelt för bönder att åstadkomma enastående resultat en förutsättning för framgång. Här ligger Väderstad AB med sina jordbearbetnings- och såmaskiner i branschens framkant vilket ställer höga krav på kontinuerlig innovation och utveckling.
Nu söker vi en Software Test Engineer med några års erfarenhet av mjukvarutest/ systemtest som vill vara med oss på vår resa framåt. Bonden står bakom den mat vi äter, vi står bakom bonden.
Rollen är placerad på Väderstad kontor i Linköping, Mjärdevi.
Har du passion för området mjukvarutestning och vill arbeta med att bygga upp, driva och utveckla testmiljöer då är det här tjänsten för dig.
Om rollen
Som Software Test Engineer är du med i hela kedjan från produktidé till test på fysisk maskin. Arbetsuppgifterna består främst av att arbeta med testning och kvalitetssäkring av mjukvaran i våra inbyggda system, men också en del hårdvara.
I dina arbetsuppgifter ingår bland annat:* Utveckling av våra testmiljöer och testriggar för att verifiera våra styrsystem
* Bygga ut våra automatiska tester för nya funktioner samt förbättra befintliga
* Förbättringsarbete i våra testprocesser och testmetoder
* Att vara delaktig i att etablera och förbättra rutiner/arbetssätt
* Felsökning av hårdvara/mjukvara i våra testriggar


Den vi söker
Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av att arbeta som mjukvarutestare och brinner för att säkerställa högsta kvalitet i varje steg. Du är initiativtagande och har ett driv att tillsammans med teamet leverera kvalité i dina arbetsuppgifter och nå uppsatta mål. Vidare är du som person noggrann och besitter en analytisk och problemlösande förmåga.
Har du dessutom en teknisk utbildning på högskole- eller universitetsnivå är du en ännu bättre matchning.
Vi värdesätter personlighet högt och söker dig som, utöver rätt kompetens, har en positiv inställning och en förmåga att bidra till vårt team med engagemang och samarbetsvilja. Vi är ett gott team med härlig stämning och ser att driv och initiativtagande är viktiga egenskaper hos dig för att trivas. För att sedan kunna göra jobbet med kvalité är noggrannhet, analytisk förmåga och problemlösning till din nytta. Att arbeta självständigt tillsammans med andra för att nå bra resultat är inte en utmaning för dig!
Goda kunskaper och erfarenheter av C# och Python är ett krav.
Kunskap och erfarenhet av följande program/miljöer är meriterande:* Jenkins och automatiserade testmiljöer
* Testmiljöer i form av HIL (Hardware-in-the-loop)
* Vector CANoe
* Selenium


Övrig information
För frågor gällande rollen vänligen kontakta Christian Ganbrant på 0142-812 21 eller christian.ganbrant@vaderstad.com
För frågor gällande rekryteringsprocessen vänligen kontakta HRBP Ida Evertsson på 0142-81435 eller ida.evertsson@vaderstad.com.
Ansökan  

Är du intresserad av tjänsten och motsvarar kraven är du välkommen att skicka in din ansökan med CV senaste den 24:e januari 2025.

title: Product Verification Engineer
description:
ECARX (Nasdaq: ECX) is a global mobility-tech company that partners with leading Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) to reshape the automotive industry as it transitions toward an all-electric future. With innovative technology such as central computers, System-on-a-Chip (SoCs), and software solutions, ECARX is driving the next generation of in-car user experiences. Since its founding in 2017, ECARX has grown to nearly 2,000 employees, and its products have been integrated into over 5 million vehicles worldwide.  

  

About the Role


We are seeking talented and driven **Verification Engineers** to join our dynamic and rapidly growing Product Verification Team. In this role, you will collaborate with your team to perform product-level verification for our cutting-edge infotainment products, ensuring top-tier quality in global project deliveries. Working closely with other verification engineers, project leaders, and development teams, you will play a critical role in securing the success of our innovative automotive solutions.

### **What You Will Do**

* **Design Test Strategies**: Develop comprehensive test strategies tailored to project requirements.
* **Generate and Execute Test Cases**: Create and run test cases to validate product functionality and performance.
* **Conduct Exploratory Testing**: Dive deep into products to uncover issues beyond standard test cases.
* **Participate in Vehicle Test Expeditions**: Test our products in real-world vehicle environments.
* **Perform Field Testing at Customer Sites**: Ensure seamless product integration and functionality at customer locations.
* **Manage Issues**: Track, analyze, and drive resolutions for technical issues.

### **What You Need**

* **Collaborative Spirit**: A team player with excellent communication skills and a strong sense of collaboration.
* **Proactive Mindset**: Self-motivated, disciplined, and capable of working independently.
* **Software Verification Experience**: Proven expertise in software verification processes.
* **Automotive Industry Background**: Prior experience within the automotive sector.
* **Driver’s License (Category B)**: Essential for on-site testing and vehicle expeditions.
* **Language Skills**: Proficiency in Chinese Mandarin is a plus.


Join us in shaping the future of in-car experiences and delivering world-class automotive solutions!

title: Electrical Harness Engineer
description:
Application Deadline: Feb. 25, 2025 Ängelholm On-site  



The Koenigsegg Software & Electronics department is responsible for designing and developing software, electronic control units (ECU) and supporting tools for all Koenigsegg's cars. We are working very closely with the other engineering departments, production and service/aftersales. We are now looking to expand the team with skilled and experienced electrical harness engineers with the ability to transform product requirements and production needs to state of the art solutions and to also further advance the electrical architecture in our cars.


The responsibilities associated with this position put a strong requirement on your ability to cooperate with other departments in other technical domains. The development activities are primarily focused on electrical harness schematics and electrical architecture for our cars.


**Responsibilities**


* Taking ownership of the electrical system schematics of the vehicle (harness schematics)
* Design and create Harness schematics, wiring diagrams, BOM, cables list, connectors etc.
* Work closely with mechanical, prototype and manufacturing engineers in the integration of harness and electrical components
* Work with purchasing department and external suppliers for components sourcing
* Experience developing system schematics, wiring diagrams and electrical systems.
* Good knowledge of manufacturing aspects of wireless harness design both electrical and mechanical.
* Ability to troubleshoot issues in bench and prototype vehicles

  
Skills & Requirements


* Ability to translate wire harness requirements to schematics and wire list data
* Proven experience with physical wire harness architectural design
* Familiarity with software design and software systems
* Experience drawing schematics and wire list data for wire harness
* Experience working with manufacturing methods, fabrication or assembly processes
* Fluency in English
Great Place to Work


Opportunity to impact a growing company


Work alongside world-class talent


Flexible work schedules + Culture of collaboration


Long track record of success and profitability


Engaging and sharing work environment


Quick decision making, flat hierarchy


About the company


Koenigsegg is most known for building some of the fastest cars in the world; with almost all of our megacar technologies that are patented and made in-house by our almost 500 world-class technicians, engineers, sourcing experts, production craftsmen, and communicators.


What we’ve created is a unique proving ground of engineering creativity that makes use of our breakthrough megacar development and legacy to push the boundaries of sustainable mobility technology.



So, what’s next?


We are on a universe-denting mission to develop the next generation of breakthrough tech and products. We are looking for outstanding, impactful, and authentic individuals to grow with us. Our ambitions are inspiring but will push the limits of what is possible – requiring one to work efficiently amid our cross-functional teams to execute at high-quality levels.


**The goal is clear: innovate and transform.**
